website_summaries.verdict: This comprehensive set of sandwich cutters has all the equipment you need to make a younger child’s lunch fun and inviting.
pros: Offers a variety of sandwich decrusters in cute shapes that smaller kids love
Comes with mini fruit and veggie cutters, animal food picks, and adorable scratch-off lunch notes
Works well with a variety of bread textures
cons: Some owners find that thinner slices tear easily

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed 😞 I received my order today but it’s missing the food picks and the fruit and veggie cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Danitza Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Really cool! Not perfect but fun
customer_reviews.text: Kids eat more when their food is presented in a fun way :) With the sandwich cutter being plastic you need to push a little harder and use more work. There isn't really an easy way to have it cut thru a sandwich :( you have to basically cut each slice of bread and then make your sandwich. You cant make a Turkey sandwich and then cut the whole sandwich it doesnt cut all the way thru and then starts tearing the bread apart. The metal "cheese" cutters are bomb dot com. Bees knees. I personally would love the plastic sandwich cutters in metal but gave me the idea to use the metal cookie cutters, we are satisfied :)
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Good for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: You have to be a little creative with positioning to cut the shapes out completely, especially with smaller bread slices. But these are essential for picky eaters. For a while, I couldn't get my pre-schooler to eat anything but peanut butter and jelly sandwiches. With these, she's now willing to eat all different kinds of sandwiches. They're so irresistibly cute, you can't help but want to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: My daughter finally eats her lunch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with my purchase! My daughter wasn’t eating her lunch at school, no matter what I did. I kept changing the food I was packing in her lunch box and nothing worked, and then I found these. Since then, honestly, she has eaten her sandwich every single day!!! Wow! Her teachers even asked me about it because they were so impressed. I definitely think you should cut the bread using these before putting anything inside. It’s less messy and easier to get a good cut, and then add the PB&J or anything else :)
customer_reviews.author: Judy Bas

customer_reviews.title: So cute! We love this!
customer_reviews.text: This set is adorable! I’m not into Pinterest worthy lunches and don’t use this every time but when I do it takes literally 5 seconds and my kids love it! They actually eat the whole thing and usually ask for another. With small bread there isn’t much waste (less than they would leave without it being cut). The yellow love the little animal picks for fruit or cheese. I haven’t tried the small shape cutters yet. I’ve used regular cookie cutters for their sandwiches in the past but these seem to work better as they are deeper. So fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amy G

customer_reviews.title: Fun shapes and it will get your kid to eat!
customer_reviews.text: I like how sharp the cutters are, without being dangerously sharp. They cut all types of bread very well and easily. They were a hit at one of my kids play dates! I bought it to get my 3.5 year old to eat more, and it worked. She will eat more than normal because her food looks pretty and fun. Who doesn't want to eat cheese in the shape of stars?? Also, the little picks and forks are really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Luke & Ashley Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is still sitting on my counter still in the box. It’s been 3 months. It’s so cute and I’m hoping one day I’ll have time to make my 3y/o super cute lunches with a sweet note. Meanwhile I’m sending fruits that don’t need cutting and cereal bars. But in 2020 I’m totally doing it... and also losing 10 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Too many to choose from! I haven’t used all of them yet but tried 4 bread cutters already. Great to have at home when you have little kids. They a little to big though than the normal bread loaf size but it works! Fruit cutters are kinda hard to use, but the tiny animal sticks are very cute! My daughter love it when I put one in her lunch box! What’s not to like is that they have this phone number written in the instruction for you to text to get lunch box messages but they never responded.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these
customer_reviews.text: These have encouraged my children to help make their own lunches and pick out which shape to use. Washing them in the dish washer does make their beight color fade, but over all I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product from Great Business!!
customer_reviews.text: I am OVER THE MOON about your sandwich cutters! My 2.5 year old loves to help and I even get so excited trying the new ones! They work great and I am not only impressed with the product but I am more impressed with a follow up email from your business. Being a daughter of parents who are entrepreneurs with small businesses, I value the professional yet personal touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome except they are too big
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 year old as she makes her own sandwiches for school and couldn’t cut them with a knife. She really likes them. I like that I can throw them in the dishwasher and they clean well and won’t rust. The only problem is that they are a little too big for the bread so the cut out isn’t quite complete and they don’t always cut the whole way through. The crown one also doesn’t let go of the spokes so it doesn’t come out quite right. Other than that they are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I work as a school cafeteria supervisor over cold lunch and my kids LOVE the different shapes. I even got a little girl who won't eat her sandwich to start eating!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: The shapes are cute, however these just don’t work for us. They are way too big to fit the bread we use. They are just collecting dust in our closet.
customer_reviews.author: Remy L.

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I would send my daughter to school with a sandwich cut in half and she would come home to the sandwich being picked apart and still left in the lunchbox. I discovered this ... it’s a miracle. She loves to make her sandwiches then pick her own shape and there are so many shapes she never gets tired of it I love it !
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Ghanaian kids must try this 😘😘😘
customer_reviews.text: Running a shop in Ghana , decided to buy and try with my kids before selling to my customers. First of all , was impressed with amazon's timely delivery as well as the packaging. Unboxing to find out it contained every piece it said it would was comforting. We tried it on our homemade banana bread and it came out well. Thank you UpChefs , would definitely stock up for Ghanaian parents to try .
customer_reviews.author: Littlehipkids, 🇬🇭

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for no crust kids.
customer_reviews.text: A must buy to entertain kids lunches. What is it about kids not liking crust on bread? Cute shapes to cut off the crust. My daughter likes the imprint to stay together while my son likes the individual shapes separate. The two fruit shape tubes are fun to punch out melon shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Addict

customer_reviews.title: Get these!
customer_reviews.text: These are better than I could have hoped for! Perfect for my kids sandwiches. Adds a little fun to our picnic lunches!
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: So so...
customer_reviews.text: Cuts the sandwiches just okay. Does a poor job of doing it neatly, the crusts and sides of sandwich are jagged using these. It’s not a clean or neat cut.
customer_reviews.author: Tambria M. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Designs are great, but did not work well
customer_reviews.text: The cutters are not sharp enough. I understand it is for safety reasons, but the bread did not come in expected shapes
customer_reviews.author: PNW Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Love all the ways I can surprise the kids with their lunches. I also have used the smaller cut outs to decorate cakes and to cut fruit into fun shapes for fruit baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Great for making fun pb&j sandwiches.
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love the shapes we can make with these. It's a good sturdy product, just a little annoying to clean the stuck on peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Although there’s SO many pieces, some of them don’t cut completely through so I kinda have to force it. But other than that my son LOVES the dinosaur ones!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Makes packing a lunch fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is always excited to see what is next for lunch. The sandwich shapes are super easy. My tip is to do each piece of bread one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Jakell

customer_reviews.title: Changing up fruits and veggies
customer_reviews.text: We make homemade lunch for school and saw this set on a deal. My kids have loved them. They are great at cutting and fun to change up a regular sandwich. I use the little stamper for fruits and veggies regularly and my kids eat them a little easier because they are fun shaped.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Lyn Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Average at best
customer_reviews.text: Takes effort to get the exact shape on the bread. Not the best product out there. I end up using a knife to cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Sindhu

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love it! its so cute and my daughter loves it to!

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased I ordered this set. My granddaughters love the shapes and it's made school lunches much more enticing!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These sandwich cutters and accesories are super cute. My kid loves to see and eat the different shaped foods.

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love these
customer_reviews.text: This set works really well and is fun. Good thing it doesn't waste too much bread. My daughter is much more excited about sandwiches for lunch because she gets to pick which one, her classmates think her sandwiches are cool to. Bonus fruit cutters are cute and fun, I think I will use them next to cut cheese so she can eat cheese also. Definitely get more with this set as compared to others for a better price.

customer_reviews.title: Getting my son to eat!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved all the cutters. My son has special needs and it’s very hard to get him excited about eating. He is having the best time deciding what one to use next. And the picks he uses with everything. Great quality and fun shapes. Thanks a bunch!

customer_reviews.text: My son loves the surprise of a new sandwich shape. These are sturdy, mostly easy to clean (sometimes the little corners take a few extra seconds) and so cute. My son also enjoys the animal picks holding his tacos closed.

customer_reviews.text: Cute designs for kids' lunches! Some of the intricate cutters a little hard to push sandwich out of without falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Allycat

customer_reviews.title: Great product and can be used in many different way!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids, who age range from 1-9, love these sandwich cutters and use them all the time. They are always asking to use them when we have sandwiches. These also work great for cookies, jello, and play dough. We made dinosaur shaped cookies for my son's first birthday and they were a hit! I have washed them in the top rack of my dishwasher and they held up perfectly! Seller has been great to work with and quickly responded to any questions I had. I would definitely buy again from this seller and I love this product!

customer_reviews.title: Strong and cut easily

customer_reviews.title: Super fun sandwich cutters

These are well made, easy to use, and most importantly...easy to clean. I recommend these for anyone trying to encourage their kiddos to gobble up their lunch! :)

customer_reviews.title: I'm also going to try to use the sandwich cutters as cookie cutters I thought would make great shapes.

product_meta.title: Fun Sandwich and Bread Cutter Shapes for kids - 10 Crust & Cookie Cutters - Mini Heart & Flower Stainless Steel Vegetable & Fruit Stamp Set and 20 Food Picks Loved by both Boys & Girls!
feature_bullets: 😍Turn picky eaters into health food chowhounds. Little hands will happily reach for fun fruits, vegetables, whole grain bread and other healthy foods when you cut them into fun shapes and pieces! You'll get 10 BPA free sandwich cutter molds, 6 mini fruit cutter stainless steel veggie cutters, 20 miniature animal bento box food fork picks for kids, and More.

😎 YOU'LL BE THE COOLEST MOM AT SCHOOL: Your UpChefs crust remover and bento box accessories kit makes it easy for you to whip up fun school lunches in minutes. Your girl or boy of any age will love eating the healthy shaped treats you make for their lunchbox, and they will love showing them off to his friends at school!

👍 MADE FROM SAFE, STURDY MATERIALS: Your UpChefs uncrustable sandwich maker set is fashioned from food-grade plastic and is BPA free, lea-free, mercury-free, and phthlate-free. We use the same quality of materials you'd find in the kitchen of a 4 star restaurant.

😍 SATISFACTION LIFETIME WARRANTY: We're so convinced your family will love these fun crustable food cutters and bento kit decoration supplies that we offer them to you with a 30 day 100% Satisfaction and Lifetime Warranty Guarantee.
